description:
Watch your favourite machines on your phone! Features Excavator,Wheel Loader,Roller,Airplane,Steam Engine,Dump Truck,Car,Battleship,Helicopter,Truck,Crane,Chopper,Concrete Mixer, Loader & even the Concorde!

Features two pictures per machine, just turn your device sideways. 
Includes sounds, tap the screen to hear it.
Slide over the picture to go to the next or previous one.

Please use the feedback form if you have any issues or ideas 
Follow us on twitter: http://www.twitter.com/thinmachine
